channel.title: Comments for page "Boots of Walking"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Boots of Walking"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: The information is now publicly available. All hail Gaussian Village! Simply mix a Mantis Rune and Wasteland Boots Design, mix that with an Indestructible Thread, and you'll be walking all over the Wasteland in no time!

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Perhaps the person who found out the information didn't make it publicly available? That's how a lot of things were with the Wastelands content at first.

item.title: Wha?
item.content:encoded: Wait, we know that they exist, we only know they exist because someone else made them (Like how everything on this site has been found out) but we DONT know how to make them? How does that make sence? Someone made them but they dont know how?
